attributes.additional_details: We can't control a menstrual cycle unless we get contraception and some women don't want contraception. Condoms are free and sex is a choice, a menstrual cycle isn't.
attributes.background: I want sanitary products to be free! There are hundreds of females who can't afford them and if contraception can be free why can't sanitary products be! We are not in control.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
